Debounce (ngTasty.service.debounce)

An Angular Service for limits the rate at which a function can fire

<button class="btn btn-info btn-lg" ng-click="plusOne()">Plus One</button>
<h2 ng-bind="number"></h2>
 
.controller('MyCtrl', function($scope, debounce) {
  $scope.number = 1;
  $scope.plusOne = debounce(function () {
    $scope.number += 1;
  }, 1000);
})
